data.title: First Edition, First Printing
data.meta_description: Dystopian novel frequently compared with A Clockwork Orange due to its imaginary dialect and harsh depiction of a post-apocalyptic world. Winner of the John W. Campbell Award and a Nebula Award nominee. Hardcover. First Edition, First Printing. Octavo, black paper covered boards with gilt lettering on spine. London: Jonathan Cape, 1980. Pringle, Science
data.text:
Russell Hoban

Riddley Walker

Dystopian novel frequently compared with A Clockwork Orange due to its imaginary dialect and harsh depiction of a post-apocalyptic world. Winner of the John W. Campbell Award and a Nebula Award nominee.

Hardcover. First Edition, First Printing. Octavo, black paper covered boards with gilt lettering on spine. London: Jonathan Cape, 1980. Pringle, Science Fiction: The 100 Best Novels (93). Burgess, Ninety-Nine Novels. ISBN: 0224018515. #10202.

Fine in fine dust jacket.
